Column Comment.0: GRANTED BY BUSINESS ASSOCIATE IDENFIFIER: Unique idenfier for thebusiness associate who grants this type of license.
Column Comment.1: LICENSE TYPE: The type of license that has been granted, such as an activitylicenes to produce, flare etc. In some jurisdicitons a single license may be granted tocover all operations, in others seperate licenses are granted based on the type ofoperation.
Column Comment.2: LICENSE CONDITION: A list of valid condition types that can be placed on a license.These conditions may require activities, payments, reports, time deadlines etc.Management of these conditions may be undertaken through the OBLIGATIONorPROJECT Modules as appropriate to your business.
Column Comment.3: ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation used for reference type or code.
Column Comment.4: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.5: EFFECTIVE DATE: the date on which this row of data first came into effect from abusiness perspective.
Column Comment.6: EXPIRY DATE: the date on which this row of data is no longer in effect from abusiness perspective.
Column Comment.7: LONG NAME: Common long name given to reference type or code.
Column Comment.8: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should becreated.
Column Comment.9: PROPERTY CONTROL SET IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for the property controlinformation. This can be used to help you control how a vertical table is implemented,by determining preferred units of measure, data entry types and other specificationsfor each kind of property that is defined.
Column Comment.10: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.11: SHORT NAME: Common short name given to reference type or code.
Column Comment.12: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.13: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.14: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.15: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.16: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.17: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.18: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.19: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
